alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:00PM EST until February 19 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Allegheny River At Parker affecting Clarion and Armstrong Counties.
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAC005-031-181600- /O.EXT.KPBZ.FL.W.0005.000000T0000Z-220219T1100Z/ /PARP1.1.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 1100 PM EST Thu Feb 17 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Allegheny River at Parker. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Several homes on Route 268 flood. The crest is not expected to get this high. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 20.2 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.9 feet on 03/15/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
